sentences.en: He has a good overall sense of justice and fairness.
sentences.cn: 他极富正义感和公平意识。

sentences.en: He says the new document will guar-antee fairness for blacks in Georgia.
sentences.cn: 他说这个新文件将保证佐治亚州的黑人受到公平对待。

sentences.en: He was praised for his fairness and high integrity.
sentences.cn: 他的公正和正直操守受人称道。

sentences.en: Her introduction is a model of fairness, a lively summation of Irish history.
sentences.cn: 她的导论是客观公正的典范，是对爱尔兰历史的生动概括。

sentences.en: Her sunburnt skin accentuates the fairness of her hair.
sentences.cn: 她那晒黑了的皮肤突出了她的一头金发.

sentences.en: In fairness , Nim reasoned, he could only blame himself.
sentences.cn: 尼姆想,平心而论, 他只能责怪自己.

sentences.en: In fairness to Bates, he always made it very clear that Webb was only on trial until the end of the season.
sentences.cn: 替贝茨说句公道话，他意思一直很明确，韦布在本赛季结束前只是试用。

sentences.en: It does hold you to certain standards of fairness.
sentences.cn: 它的确能让你恪守某些公平原则。

sentences.en: Our teacher is known for her fairness in grading pupils.
sentences.cn: 我们的老师以给学生评分公平著称.

sentences.en: That decision raised questions about the secretary of state's powers and the fairness of his procedure.
sentences.cn: 那个决定引起人们对国务卿的权力及其做法的公平性的质疑。

sentences.en: the basic fairness of the judicial system
sentences.cn: 司法制度的基本公正性

sentences.en: The new system of waiting lists should guarantee fairness to all patients.
sentences.cn: 新的候诊名单系统应当保证对每一位病人都公平.

sentences.en: The profit motive is inherently at odds with principles of fairness and equity.
sentences.cn: 盈利动机天生就与公平和公正的原则相抵触。

sentences.en: Their reputation for fairness is a matter for pride.
sentences.cn: 他们公正的名声令他们引以为豪.

sentences.en: There is much more to be said, in all fairness, on both sides of the issue.
sentences.cn: 公平地说，问题的正反两面都还有很多要说的。

sentences.en: These women are demanding fairness and equality in their pay.
sentences.cn: 这些妇女要求在薪酬方面的公正和平等.

words.tran_cn: 公平的；美丽的，白皙的；[气象] 晴朗的

trans.tran_cn: 公正，公平，（皮肤的）洁白，金发，顺利性
